data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SURPRIZE cruise from St. Johns to Lisbon started at 1781-11-02
Ship: Surprize (Sloop), Voyage: St Johns Nf - Lisbon, 1st Observer: Samuel Reeve (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 18G 222BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
